snippet: Paul Greenberg is blogging via satellite as he travels down the Stuyahok River in search of sockeye salmon, which number 40 million this time of year.
abstract: Paul Greenberg is blogging via satellite as he travels down the Stuyahok River in search of sockeye salmon, which number 40 million this time of year.

headline.main: A Meal Tinged With Sadness and Thanks
